name: Bolt
title: bolt.new
payoff: Build full-stack web and mobile apps
shortDescription: Bolt enables developers to promptly create, run, edit, and deploy full-stack web and mobile applications. It's designed for developers looking for a streamlined development process. An example use case is a startup quickly prototyping and deploying an MVP to validate their business model.
pros: Supports both web and mobile platforms
cons: May not support all programming languages
Potentially steep learning curve for beginners
